pli-tv-bu-vb-sk41:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk41:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivaranti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk41:1.3: “Na anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk41:1.5: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṃ vivarati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
